gw.api.database.spatial

Class SpatialPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.database.spatial.SpatialPolygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpatialObject, GWRemotable

    public final class SpatialPolygon
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpatialObject
    Opaque representation of a spatial polygon. Only the Well-Known Text is exposed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpatialPolygon()
      Required for SOAP serialization/deserialization.

      Construct new SpatialPolygon described by given Well-Known Text.
      SpatialPolygon(java.lang.String streamName, java.io.InputStream stream)
      Construct new SpatialPolygon described by Well-Known Text in given stream.

      • createRectangle

        public static SpatialPolygon createRectangle(SpatialPoint point1,
                             SpatialPoint point2)
        Utility method to create a polygon that is a rectangle where the two given points are diagonally opposed points.

      • centerOfRectangle

        public static SpatialPoint centerOfRectangle(SpatialPoint point1,
                             SpatialPoint point2)
        Utility method to compute the center of a rectangle. The two given points are diagonally opposed points in the rectangle.

        Checks if the geometry is valid. Note that for some database types, this could execute a query against the database.
